title: Buy or Win Tour de France-raced Qhubeka X Hunt Aerodynamicist carbon wheels
content:
This Team Qhubeka x Hunt collaboration is a rare opportunity to help out a charity, buy a unique piece of cycling gear actually raced in the Tour de France, or even just win that same set of Tour-ridden wheels with no purchase necessary.
